VISION: To achieve economic empowerment of Rural and Urban Women by providing opportunities for participation, protection, economic development, and capacity building. 1. Skill and Vocational Training Programmes for Women: a) Tomato processing, Tailoring, Fashion Designing, Basic Sewing Machine operator and surface ornamentation, ERC(English & Work Readiness in Computer), Beautician courses, Tie & Dye, Bed side nursing, She Auto & car driving. Courses, Pre Primary Teacher training , DTP, MPHW(F) courses. Jute and leather bags making , Jardosi work, Food Processing , and other short term training program. b) Since inception we covered about 7000 women in the above training programs. c) Funding agencies are DRDA, MEPMA, APSKWDC, WD&CD, Medical and Health Dept, GOI. 2. Regular Departmental Training Units: a) Anganwadi workers Training Center assisted by (GOI, WCD), covered 10,000 women. b) Training to Asha volunteers assisted by Health & Family Welfare covered 4000 women 3.
